per mil AIR: Parts per thousand, compared to the isotope reference standard atmospheric nitrogen gas (AIR)
per mil VCDT: Parts per thousand, compared to the isotope reference standard Vienna-Canyon Diablo Troilite (VCDT)
per mil VPDB: Parts per thousand, compared to the isotope reference Vienna Pee Dee Belemnite (VPDB)
per mil VSMOW: Parts per thousand, compared to the isotope reference standard Vienna Standard Mean Ocean Water (VSMOW)
TCU: True colour units, equivalent to one Hazen unit and to one Pt-Co unit
